comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See www.hammondharwoodhouse.org/ and en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hammond-Harwood_House and hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/hhh.md0035 for more on the lower building, which still exists and is open to the public. hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/hhh.md0084 includes at least one photograph of the stables at Homewood -- the upper picture.

comment.author: 36906564@N05
36501046@N02
comment._content: Thank you swanq for your identification of the Hammond-Harwood House and the Homewood stables cyanotypes by Thomas Smillie! We would also like to thank canaan_1977 for the background information on the Hammond-Harwood House! We especially appreciate the weblinks included in your comments. Your efforts have made these images more accessible and useable, which are goals shared by both Flickr and the Smithsonian.

comment._content: Please see a blog post related to this image here: blog.photography.si.edu/2009/05/07/reflections-on-womens-...

comment.author: 7791881@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Annapolis & Eastport Historical Images, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
